content: अभिघातः {@--1@} Striking, (<ab>fig.</ab> also); beating, smiting, attack, injury, hurt; तटाभिघातादिव लग्नपंके <ls>Ku. 7. 49</ls>; शीतातपाभिघातान् <ls>Ms. 12. 77</ls> attacks of heat and cold; so दुःख°, शोक° &c. {@--2@} (In Vaiśeṣika <ab>phil.</ab>) Striking against (such as gives rise to sounds &c.), regarded as a kind of संयोग. {@--3@} Striking back, driving or warding off. {@--4@} Extirpation, complete destruction or removal; दुःखत्रयाभिघाताज्जिज्ञासा तदभिघातके हेतौ <ls>Sāṅ. K. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Abrupt or vehement articulation of words (as of Vedic texts); sudden shock. --तं {@--1@} The combination of the 4th letter of any class with the first or third letter of that class; of the second with the first; and of the third with the second letter of any class; अभिघातं स्यात्पूर्वं वेदद्वित्र्यादिवर्णाश्चेत् . नववर्गाणां नवतो धरणीचंद्रद्विरामाद्याः <ls>Śabdak.</ls> {@--2@} A harsh pronunciation caused by the neglect of {%Saṃdhi%} rules.
